content:
CompositionOptions Enum

Definition

Defines options for export providers.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum CompositionOptions
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
CompositionOptions

Fields

Default

No options are defined.
DisableSilentRejection

Silent rejection is disabled, so all rejections will result in errors.
ExportCompositionService

This provider is an export composition service.
IsThreadSafe

This provider should be thread-safe.
